title: TOWIE's Chloe Sims enjoys first date with Pamela Anderson’s footballer ex Adil Rami
text:

The Only Way Is Essex veteran Chloe Sims is said to be dating Pamela Anderson's ex boyfriend Adil Rami after being spotted out on a date together in London over the weekend.

Chloe, 37, and Adil, 33, were seen leaving celebrity hotspot Chiltern Firehouse on Saturday night, with a source telling MailOnline the pair were enjoying a first date.

The source also told the publication that Pamela Anderson's ex flew in especially from France to take Chloe out.

(Image: OLD BOY'S CLUB - TIMMIE / BACKGRID)

Chloe looked chic for their date night in a black floor length satin jacket and a glamorous make-up look.

The Only Way Is Essex beauty exuded elegance in the sophisticated ensemble, which ensured Adil's eyes would only be on her.

The pair jumped into the back of a cab together following their evening at the venue.

(Image: OLD BOY'S CLUB - TIMMIE / BACKGRID)

The French footballer had a highly-publicised split from Baywatch icon Pamela, 52, this summer. Back in June, Pamela alleged that Adil cheated on her with his former partner and led a double life when they were together.

The shocking claims were made in a devastating email exchange allegedly between the Playboy and Rami's ex Sidonie Biémont, who is the mother of his two children.

Pamela was with the footballer for two years but claimed their relationship had "been a big lie".

(Image: OLD BOY'S CLUB - TIMMIE / BACKGRID)

Pamela previously revealed that Rami had controlled her life and said she was forced to cut out any of her friends who said negative things about the pro sportsman.

Hollywood beauty Pamela also made allegations against Adil for 'mental abuse', violence and cheating - all of which he has denied.

The former couple were last seen together in Malibu at the beginning of June.

(Image: GC Images)

(Image: Getty Images)

Meanwhile Chloe has been trying to mend her broken heart following a bitter split with her Towie co-star Dan Edgar.

The blonde beauty was left humiliated after a dramatic TV split which saw Dan getting back together with his ex-girlfriend Amber Turner .

The 37-year-old first hit it off with Dan, 26, during the reality TV show's sun-soaked trip to Thailand in March.

(Image: REX/Shutterstock)

Dan dumped the mother-of-one in favour of his ex girlfriend Amber, but Chloe admitted that she was more heartbroken that Dan would hurt her as they were close friends for so long.

Chloe recently appeared on Celebs Go Dating alongside her sister Demi as they both searched for 'the one.'

In more recent news, fans have begged the TOWIE star to couple up with her Celebs Go Dating co-star Jack Fincham , saying they would make the 'perfect couple'.
description: The footballer reportedly flew in from France to take the reality star on a lavish London date
